ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Sidney N. Lederman ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. SIDNEY N. LEDERMAN, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective January 11, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
